dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.service.spec.rfs.ResourceFacingServiceSpec
dataStructure.description:
This is an abstract base class for defining different types of ResourceFacingServiceSpecs. A ResourceFacingServiceSpec is an abstraction that defines the invariant characteristics and behavior of a particular ResourceFacingService. The invariant portion serves as a single common basis to build a set of variable ResourceFacingServices that all use this common ResourceFacingServiceSpec. This class can be thought of as a template, which represents a generic specification for implementing a particular type of Service. A ServiceSpecification may consist of other ServiceSpecifications supplied together as a collection. Members of the collection may be offered individually or collectively. ServiceSpecifications may also exist within groupings, such as within a Product. ServiceSpecification inherits from Specification, which inherits from ManagedEntity.

This entity is abstract

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: ResourceFacingServiceSpec

This association end is optional
child.label: customerFacingServiceSpec
